text: Table 3 Risk factors for the development of BCIS Patient factors ASA TI-1V Pre-existing pulmonary hypertension Significant cardiac disease Osteoporosis Surgical factors Pathological fracture Intertrochanteric fracture Long-stem arthroplasty 速 oldage 速 poor pre-existing physical reserve 速 impaired cardiopulmonary function 速 bony metastases e concomitant hip fractures, particularly pathological or intertrochanteric fracture
